selectionbar_help.message: You are testing a new extension "SelectionBar";. This is a new tool, to help you do thing quickly. We are working on this extension daily, so if you find any issue, don't disable it, please fill this form, and we will fix it ASAP (less than 12 hours). Do you have a great idea to SelectionBar? Tell us! To Disable SelectionBar on this page, click on the extension icon.
